Logseq

Summary

An open source, local-first, outliner PKM

Jots

An Electron application with logic implemented in ClojureScript. Makes heavy use of EDN

ClojureScript

~/.logseq

config/

preferences and installed plugins / themes

git/

version control for your graphs, if you have it enabled and donâ€™t already have git configured within your graph folders

graphs/

Transit files for each of your local graphs

plugins/

the code and related distribution files for each of your installed plugins

preferences.json

Currently enabled themes

settings/

configuration for themes and plugins

Logseq Plugins

Plugins written in some form of JavaScript to extend Logseq functionality and make My Logseq Workflow spicy. This section focuses on plugin development. None of it is needed to install and use plugins from within the application.
